member.name: T:JJ.Framework.Common.ConfigurationHelper
member.summary: For using configuration settings when you cannot be dependent on System.Configuration.

member.name: T:JJ.Framework.Common.Int32Helper
member.summary: Static classes cannot get extension membrers. Instead we have the Int32Helper class for extra static members.

member.summary: Static classes cannot get extension membrers. Instead we have the DoubleHelper class for extra static members.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.Common.DoubleHelper.IsSpecialValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns true if the value is NaN, PositiveInfinity or NegativeInfinity.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.Common.KeyHelper.CreateKey(System.Object[])
